Subjects: Alexis, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: ‘þe lyf of Eufemyan of Rome’ (St. Alexis), later version — in 6-line stanza

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
LEsteneþ alle & herkeneþ meȝong & olde thewe
                    & freoAnd I ȝou telle sonehou a ȝong man gent &
                    freo…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…þat we mote him seruyAnd for þe loue of
                    AlexiiTo his blisse wende
BodLauMis463.Note:
Set forth with third and sixth lines to right of the pairs they follow,
                    and with paraph marks as if twelve-line stanzas, aabccbddeffe.
